--- Switchblade / Astrotrain ---

Switchblade nods to Megatron, and then to Shockwave. "Yes Lord 
Megatron." He quickly pops over to the injured Unitron. "Now what 
have we here..." He whips out two laser pistols and presses a little 
button on them. They transform into portable welding lasers. He 
begins to work on the severly damaged Unitron, and thinks to 
himself, <<This bot looks like he's been in a fight with Megatron... 
Ouch!>> Switchblade continues to fix the broken bot.

Astrotrain transforms, having been completely emptied. He walks 
over to Megatron. "Lord Megatron, Astrotrain reporting, as 
requested. What would you have me do?" The large bot stands at 
his full height awaiting Megatron's words, until he actually looks at 
the bot with Megatron. "S, Soundwave?!" He exclaims, unable to 
contain his surprise.


On 22 Jun 2001, at 16:19, robertdahl wrote:

> Megatron took a second to look at Switchblade, then told him, "Repair
> Shockwaves troop, Unitron." he commanded. "Then join me in the command
> room."
